title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7414.7 - Emergency and inpatient mental health services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7414.7 - Emergency and inpatient mental health services

State Regulations
(a) OCFS shall have a designated plan with a
local mental health provider for resident access to emergency mental health
services. (b) OCFS shall have a
written agreement with the Office of Mental Health to provide resident access
to inpatient mental health services at certified hospitals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7414.7

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
